item.title: P... what?
item.description: Over the years, I’ve found that many software engineers either aren’t familiar with other roles at their organization or are often confused by them. This is by no fault of their own because managerial roles differ from company to company and often people overextend their responsibilities to make up for a deficiency in the organization. It also doesn’t help that so many of them have roughly the same abbreviation: PM.
